```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lterdatasampler)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r, fig.cap= "this is my caption"}
pie_crab <- pie_crab

ggplot(data = pie_crab, aes(x= latitude, y= size)) +
  geom_jitter()
```
```{r}
crab_sum <- pie_crab %>% 
  group_by(site) %>% 
  summarise(mean_size = round(mean(size), 2),
            sd_size = round(sd(size), 2),
            sample_size = n())
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
crab_sum %>%
  kable(col.names = c("Site", "Mean Size", "Size Standard Devietion", "Sample Size")) %>%
  kable_classic() %>%
  scroll_box(height = "200px", width = "700px")
```
